description_text:
Hi

I have the simsonn pro plus 2 pedals, I want to buy haptic. But I Don t
understand if I just have to buy the 2 haptic kit vam pro set 2 pacs with
power supply or if I have to buy a control box too.
And I want to know if everything is included in the vam pro set to put the
haptic to pedals

Thanks for your next reply

Salutations from Switzerland

Thomas pette

conversations.body_text:
Sorry for that past question do If i WANT haptoc for 2 pedals what do i
hâve to ordre on the site please.
Amd i See the power supplie use Not european power point ?????

Thanks for your reply

Thomas pette

Le lun. 2 juin 2025, 21:04, support
你好，Thomas Pette，  您可以在订单中留言，要求提供欧洲电源插头，我们会在发货前相应地调整配件。
